methods.name: getPropertyMap
methods.comment:
Returns the PropertyMap with the given name or null if no PropertyMap
 exists with that name.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the name of the property to retrieve.

methods.name: getIntPropertyMap
methods.comment: Returns the IntPropertyMap associated with the given name.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the name of the property to retrieve.

methods.name: getLongPropertyMap
methods.comment: Returns the LongPropertyMap associated with the given name.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the name of the property to retrieve.

params.name: propertyName

methods.comment: Returns the ObjectPropertyMap associated with the given name.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the name of the property to retrieve.

methods.name: getVoidPropertyMap
methods.comment: Returns the VoidPropertyMap associated with the given name.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the name of the property to retrieve.

methods.name: removePropertyMap
methods.comment: Removes the PropertyMap with the given name.

params.name: propertyName
params.comment: the name of the property to remove.

return.comment: true if a PropertyMap with that name was found (and removed)

methods.javadoc: Returns an iterator over the names of all existing PropertyMangers.

methods.comment: Returns an iterator over the names of all existing PropertyMangers.

methods.name: removeAll
methods.comment:
Removes any property at the given address from all defined
 PropertyManagers.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address at which to remove all properties.
